Evil Dead II

Rank: 137


Ash Williams- the lone survivor of an earlier onslaught of flesh-possessing spirits- holes up in a cabin with a group of strangers while the demons continue their attack.


Director: Sam Raimi

Writer: Sam Raimi, Scott Spiegel

Stars: Bruce Campbell, Sarah Berry, Dan Hicks

Tags: B,Horror, Dark Comedy, Farce, Folk Horror, Slapstick, Splatter Horror, Supernatural Horror, Zombie Horror, Comedy, Horror
